definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
variant of 軋馬路|轧马路[ya4 ma3 lu4]
to stroll around the streets (esp. of a young couple)

sentences.english: A banal landscape of ugly new towers flanks both sides.
sentences.chinese: 马路两遍的是平凡丑陋的新摩天大楼的景象。

sentences.english: They want to live on the road.
sentences.chinese: 他们就想睡在大马路上。

sentences.english: Walking through the crowded street, we often feels very mixed-up about our life.
sentences.chinese: 走在人流匆匆的马路中，常常感到迷茫。

sentences.english: Park the car in the driveway so it's off the street.
sentences.chinese: 把车停在车道上，要开时便可以直接通到马路。

sentences.english: I like looking for an attractive street, then calmed oneself down in the above gas walks idly.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢找一条漂亮的马路，然后在上面气定神闲地走。

sentences.english: While crossing the street, he looked right and left, afraid that he might run into some passing car.
sentences.chinese: 他穿过马路时，左顾右盼，害怕撞到过路的车子上。

sentences.english: The wind drifted the leaves across the road.
Broad boulevards are unimpeded by traffic in the new district, called Kangbashi New Area.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的马路畅通无阻的纵横在名叫康巴什的新城。

sentences.english: Don't kick the ball into the road.
sentences.chinese: 不要把球踢到马路上去。

sentences.english: Already be the luxurious go-anywhere vehicle that money buys with helping Tibet all on the road.
sentences.chinese: 马路上已经满是用援藏款买的豪华越野车。

sentences.english: A blind man smilingly declined to be helped across the street.
sentences.chinese: 盲人微笑着谢绝别人帮他过马路。

sentences.english: The car turned over twice,left the road,and ploughed into the wall.
sentences.chinese: 这辆汽车翻了两下，离开了马路，猛撞到一堵墙上。

sentences.english: While the boy was crossing the street, a car knocked him down.
sentences.chinese: 正当这小男孩穿马路的时候，一辆卡车把他撞倒了。

sentences.english: we can go to the restaurant across the street   that Italian place that we always go to.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以去马路对面那家我们常去的意大利餐厅。

sentences.english: Just imagine that you're bumper to bumper in rush-hour traffic.
sentences.chinese: 试想一下，你的车挤在水泄不通的马路上。

sentences.english: Be careful to look both ways before you cross the street.
sentences.chinese: 在你过马路之前要向路的两边都看看。

definition: pedestrian/traveler on foot/passer-by/official responsible for arranging audiences with the emperor
